questions.question: Which design pattern ensures only one instance of a class exists?
questions.explanation: The Singleton pattern restricts instantiation to a single object instance.

questions.question: The Observer pattern is used for one-to-many dependency between objects.
questions.explanation: The Observer pattern allows multiple observers to be notified of state changes in a subject.

questions.question: MVC stands for Model-View-___
questions.explanation: MVC (Model-View-Controller) is an architectural pattern separating data, presentation, and control logic.
